data.name: Solara: Starlight Horizon
data.detailed_description:
A Multiplayer Space Sandbox Experience


Set out as a nameless pilot with an unremarkable ship and a handful of credits. Earn influence and wealth by taking missions for various factions throughout the universe. Obtain the respect or ire of law enforcement, become a feared bounty hunter, a daring smuggler, or a ruthless outlaw. Every mission you take, every ship you destroy, every convoy you rob will affect your standing with numerous factions. Use your earned credits to outfit your ship, hire a crew, and purchase larger, faster, or more powerful ships.

Explore an Open-World

Traverse star systems using trade lanes, jump gates, and hidden worm holes solo or with a group of friends. Discover profitable trade routes, find bustling planets, and lifeless moons. Loot unique weapons and hardware by stumbling upon derelict ships in debris fields.




https://store.steampowered.com/app/1629780

Obtain the respect or ire of law enforcement, become a feared bounty hunter, a daring smuggler, or a ruthless outlaw. Every mission you take, every ship you destroy, every convoy you rob will affect your standing with numerous factions. Use your earned credits to outfit your ship, hire a crew, and purchase larger, faster, or more powerful ships.

Traverse star systems using trade lanes, jump gates, and hidden worm holes solo or with a group of friends. Discover profitable trade routes, find bustling planets, and lifeless moons. Loot unique weapons and hardware by stumbling upon derelict ships in debris fields.




https://store.steampowered.com/app/1629780
data.short_description: In Solara: Starlight Horizon fight, explore, trade, smuggle contraband, mine, craft, and undertake missions to gain favor with various factions throughout the universe. Earn credits, upgrade your ship, purchase new spacecraft, and explore a sci fi sandbox solo or with a group of friends

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
